name: Molcajete y Tejolote
description:
A molcajete ([molkaËˆxete]; from Nahuatl molcaxitl and tejolote are stone tools, the traditional Mexican version of the mortar and pestle, similar to the South American batan, used for grinding various food product. Traditionally carved out of a single block of vesicular basalt, molcajetes are typically round in shape and supported by three short legs. By TecnoLatinx VR Artist: Steve Vazquez
